name: Ant Nest Fortress
description:
Mr.beiko is a small game developer team, has two people in the team.

Swapdrgone and MapleChime.

Me, MapleChime am the one who wrote this thing,I'm in charge of fine art.
You can see the not remastered Version game, that is a very old version,I didn't join the team at that time, all texture made by Swapdrgone You can see the difference.

We're not sure if we'll have new members joining the team.

here is Swapdrgone Bilibili channel, you can see new video about ant nest fortress:一株火龙艹的个人空间_哔哩哔哩_bilibili
